name: AbuseIPDB_Report
author: Fabien Bloume, StrangeBee
description: Report an IP address to AbuseIPDB for abuse tracking and community sharing

configurationItems.name: categories
configurationItems.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs (e.g., '18,22' for Brute Force and SSH). See https://www.abuseipdb.com/categories for full list

configurationItems.name: comment
configurationItems.description: Optional comment describing the abuse (max 1024 characters)
